BadgeDetail.Name: Active Learning
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they take responsibility for their learning. During induction, they have actively participated in lessons, contributed to discussions and asked questions.

Task.Title: Activate
Task.Body: Write a description of at least 4 learning activities where you fully participated. At least 2 should be undertaken outside of class.Example evidence could include offering to be the spokesperson for a team, asking a question in class and completing all work set to be completed outside of class.
Task.HtmlBody:
Write a description of at least 4 learning activities where you fully participated. At least 2 should be undertaken outside of class.

Example evidence could include offering to be the spokesperson for a team, asking a question in class and completing all work set to be completed outside of class.
Task.TextileBody:
Write a description of at least 4 learning activities where you fully participated. At least 2 should be undertaken outside of class.

Example evidence could include offering to be the spokesperson for a team, asking a question in class and completing all work set to be completed outside of class.
